mapper.select: select p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_no, c.product_unit, p.product_mainimage, p.product_total from cart c, product p where c.product_no = p.product_no and member_id = #{member_id} order by p.product_no asc
mapper.update: update cart set product_unit = product_unit + #{product_unit} where product_no = #{product_no}
